title: Windows 10 Transformation Pack 5.0 - AppzDam
description:
For more info visit : appzdam.net

Windows 10 Transformation Pack - a powerful tool that will change the interface design of operating systems Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 and 8.1 on shell Windows 10. Now you will be able to evaluate all the pros and cons of the latest operating system Windows 10 without its direct installation, allow users more familiar You OSes.
Transformation Pack Windows 10 replaces the initial welcome screen, icons, interface and desktop wallpaper, sounds, themes, Metro / Modern mode, virtual desktops, the taskbar, the context menu, and other settings. Note that Windows 10 Transformation Pack modifies system files installed OSes, so for security purposes we recommend that you use the application to make a backup system to restore it if necessary.
We can not say that this program is easy to set up, so probably intended for advanced users, but those who do not have sufficient knowledge will have a lot to tinker with options and tools. You will need to select a theme, boot screen, the default search engine and other favorites. Changes themselves almost immediately come into effect. To return to the normal operating current, to turn off the effect settings utility by clicking "Uninstall".

Features :

changing the operating system interface to Windows 10
easy installation, configuration and removal
a few themes - Metro UI, UserTile, Aero and others.
integration into the install image
choice of wallpaper and welcome screen
Russian versions of Windows support

System Requirements :

Windows 2000 / XP / Vista / 7/8

What's New :

Fixed problems with permissions to modify the set features
-Fixed Version detection error, allowing installation on Windows 10
-Fixed A bug removal of wallpaper on Windows XP / Vista
-Updated Control Panel icon
-Update The logon screen wallpaper
-Update Resource hacker software to version 4.2.4
-Updated Start menu colors coincide with windows 10 RTM
-Updated Start Menu Reviver to version 3.0.0.14
-Update Windows branding
-Update Windows 10 RTM Wallpaper
-Update Windows 7 visual style for Windows 10 RTM Theme for Windows 7

FAQ :

1. It will work in 32 & 64 bit systems ?

- Yes,Work for both 32 & 64 bit

2. Is this multilanguage?

- No,Only English

3. Is this Activated?

- Not required.

4. My antivirus detect as virus?

- Just disable it until process not complete because some of antivirus count keygen,crack,patch as false +ve.
Don't worry all files safely checked by us
